question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-compiler-v2/src/file_format_generator/peephole_optimizer.rs] [Function: BasicBlockOptimizerPipeline::optimize()] [Non-termination] Can the optimization loop fail to converge due to oscillating transformations where optimizers create patterns that trigger other optimizers indefinitely, causing infinite loops during compilation and denial of service?
